readable.title: 3440952969_608eb5e42b
readable.content: A long haired skateboarder is airborne above a set of cements steps and a metal Bannister . A man jumping a rail on his skateboard . A person riding a skateboard jumps high above the concrete steps . A skateboarder props up on a pole just before descending . The skateboarder tries to do a trick down the railing .
